trans-unit.source: Boros Mastiff
trans-unit.target: 波洛斯獒犬

trans-unit.resname: DGM·1 | Boros Mastiff | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Battalion — Whenever CARDNAME and at least two other creatures attack, CARDNAME gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
trans-unit.target: 协战～每当CARDNAME与至少两个其他生物攻击时，CARDNAME获得系命异能直到回合结束。（具系命异能之生物所造成的伤害，会让其操控者获得等量的生命。）

trans-unit.resname: DGM·2 | Haazda Snare Squad | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Haazda Snare Squad
trans-unit.target: 哈资达诱捕队

trans-unit.resname: DGM·2 | Haazda Snare Squad | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may pay {W}. If you do, tap target creature an opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以支付{W}。若你如此作，则横置目标由对手操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: DGM·2 | Haazda Snare Squad | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: They've been probation officers, army grunts, bounty hunters—anything to make their district safer.
trans-unit.target: 他们身兼观护人、士兵、赏金猎人等多重角色，一切都是为了让城区更安全。

trans-unit.source: Lyev Decree
trans-unit.target: 徕夫裁决

trans-unit.resname: DGM·3 | Lyev Decree | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Detain up to two target creatures your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those creatures can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)
trans-unit.target: 拘留至多两个目标由对手操控的生物。（直到你的下一个回合，这些生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。）

trans-unit.source: The Azorius have so many codes and statutes that you're always in violation of one of them.
trans-unit.target: 俄佐立订下的法规多如牛毛，让人动辄得咎。

trans-unit.source: Maze Sentinel
trans-unit.target: 迷宫哨兵

trans-unit.resname: DGM·4 | Maze Sentinel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nMulticolored creatures you control have vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 由你操控的多色生物具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.source: The route has been known for millennia, but only by those with no means to tell it.
trans-unit.target: 这条路线虽然已经开拓数千年，但是知情者全都没办法告诉别人。

trans-unit.resname: DGM·5 | Renounce the Guilds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Renounce the Guilds
trans-unit.target: 弃绝公会

trans-unit.resname: DGM·5 | Renounce the Guilds | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player sacrifices a multicolored permanent.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各牺牲一个多色永久物。

trans-unit.resname: DGM·5 | Renounce the Guilds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Scores will die in the name of peace. That is what you call compromise?"\n—Gideon Jura, to Aurelia
trans-unit.target: 「诸多生灵将因和平之名惨遭涂炭。这就是你所谓的妥协？」 ～基定尤拉告诉欧瑞梨

trans-unit.source: Riot Control
trans-unit.target: 平息暴乱

trans-unit.resname: DGM·6 | Riot Control | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You gain 1 life for each creature your opponents control. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn.
trans-unit.target: 所有对手每操控一个生物，你便获得1点生命。于本回合中，防止将对你造成的所有伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Ravnicans need order. If they don't have it, we shall bring it to them."\n—Isperia
trans-unit.target: 「拉尼卡人需要秩序。如果他们无法自律，我们就让这些人知道什么叫秩序。」 ～伊佩利

trans-unit.resname: DGM·7 | Scion of Vitu-Ghazi | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Scion of Vitu-Ghazi
trans-unit.target: 维图加基后裔

trans-unit.resname: DGM·7 | Scion of Vitu-Ghazi | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, put a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield, then populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若你从手牌中施放之，则将一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的鸟衍生生物放进战场，然后殖民。（将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）

trans-unit.source: Steeple Roc
trans-unit.target: 尖顶洛克鸟

trans-unit.resname: DGM·8 | Steeple Roc | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, first strike
trans-unit.target: 飞行，先攻

trans-unit.source: "Sometimes it forgets to loosen its grip before taking flight. I lost my roof that way."\n—Ecaban, Boros scout
trans-unit.target: 「它起飞时偶尔会忘记松开爪子。我的屋顶就是因为这样没了。」 ～波洛斯斥候艾卡班

trans-unit.source: Sunspire Gatekeepers
trans-unit.target: 日旋门卫

trans-unit.resname: DGM·9 | Sunspire Gatekeepers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, put a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若你操控两个或更多门，则将一个2/2白色，具警戒异能的骑士衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: "You will pass with respect, or you will not pass at all."
trans-unit.target: 「想过去就放尊重点，要不然休想通过。」

trans-unit.resname: DGM·10 | Wake the Reflections | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wake the Reflections
trans-unit.target: 映像觉醒

trans-unit.resname: DGM·10 | Wake the Reflections | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
trans-unit.target: 殖民。（将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）

trans-unit.resname: DGM·10 | Wake the Reflections | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You see a bird, an oak, a packbeast. I see the potential for an army."\n—Lalia, Selesnya dryad
trans-unit.target: 「你看到的是一只鸟、一株橡树、一匹驮兽。我看到的则是成为一支军队的潜力。」 ～瑟雷尼亚树灵拉黎亚

trans-unit.source: Aetherling
trans-unit.target: 乙太精怪

trans-unit.source:
{U}: Exile Ætherling. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
{U}: Ætherling is unblockable this turn.
{1}: Ætherling gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{1}: Ætherling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {U}：放逐CARDNAME。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它在其拥有者的操控下返回战场。 {U}：CARDNAME本回合不能被阻挡。 {1}：CARDNAME得+1/-1直到回合结束。 {1}：CARDNAME得-1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Hidden Strings
trans-unit.target: 无形操丝

trans-unit.resname: DGM·12 | Hidden Strings | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may tap or untap target permanent, then you may tap or untap another target permanent.\nCipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 你可以横置或重置目标永久物，然后你可以横置或重置另一个目标永久物。 暗码（然后你可以放逐此咒语牌，并赋码于一个由你操控的生物上。每当该生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，其操控者可以施放所赋码之牌的复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。）

trans-unit.source: Maze Glider
trans-unit.target: 迷宫滑翔兽

trans-unit.resname: DGM·13 | Maze Glider | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nMulticolored creatures you control have flying.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 由你操控的多色生物具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: The pattern of the Implicit Maze extends in more than two dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 隐匿迷宫的格局往两个以上的维度延伸。

trans-unit.source: Mindstatic
trans-unit.target: 冻结心智

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {6}.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{6}，否则反击之。

trans-unit.source: "It's always satisfying to stymie the best efforts of a rival, but the reactions of the Gruul are particularly amusing."\n—Bori Andon, Izzet blastseeker
trans-unit.target: 「虽然破解敌人绝招本来就是令人高兴的事，但古鲁的反应更是令人发噱。」 ～伊捷觅爆师波力安东

trans-unit.source: Murmuring Phantasm
trans-unit.target: 低语幻象

trans-unit.resname: DGM·15 | Murmuring Phantasm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Defender
trans-unit.target: 守军

trans-unit.source: "The most insidious thing in the world is nonsense that sounds just plausible enough to listen to."\n—Lazav
trans-unit.target: 「世上最阴险的，莫过于听来合情合理的无稽之谈。」 ～拉札夫

trans-unit.resname: DGM·16 | Opal Lake Gatekeepers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Opal Lake Gatekeepers
trans-unit.target: 清辉湖门卫

trans-unit.resname: DGM·16 | Opal Lake Gatekeepers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若你操控两个或更多门，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: DGM·16 | Opal Lake Gatekeepers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Sentries guard Ravnica's landmarks and outlying districts, unaware of these places' import to the maze.
trans-unit.target: 哨兵负责看守拉尼卡的地标和外围区域，却完全不知道这些地方对迷宫有多重要。

trans-unit.source: Runner's Bane
trans-unit.target: 奔越者诅咒

trans-unit.resname: DGM·17 | Runner's Bane | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature with power 3 or less\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.\nEnchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
trans-unit.target: 结附于力量等于或小于3的生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，横置所结附的生物。 所结附的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.source: Trait Doctoring
trans-unit.target: 特性治疗

trans-unit.resname: DGM·18 | Trait Doctoring | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Change the text of target permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another or one basic land type with another until end of turn.\nCipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 更改目标永久物的规则叙述文字；将其中一种颜色文字全部更改为另一种，或是将一种基本地类别文字全部更改为另一种，直到回合结束。 暗码（然后你可以放逐此咒语牌，并赋码于一个由你操控的生物上。每当该生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，其操控者可以施放所赋码之牌的复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。）

trans-unit.source: Uncovered Clues
trans-unit.target: 已现提示

trans-unit.resname: DGM·19 | Uncovered Clues | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal up to two instant and/or sorcery cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的四张牌。你可以展示其中至多两张瞬间和／或法术牌，并将展示的牌置于你手上。将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.source: The Implicit Maze winds through Ravnica, connecting arcane landmarks of all ten guilds.
trans-unit.target: 隐匿迷宫在拉尼卡蜿蜒穿梭，连接着十大公会的神秘地标。

trans-unit.source: Wind Drake
trans-unit.target: 风龙兽

trans-unit.resname: DGM·20 | Wind Drake | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: Air currents whip through the city corridors, creating wind tunnels that accelerate urban drakes toward their prey.
trans-unit.target: 阵阵强风在城市回廊中呼啸吹过，造出的风洞让都市龙兽能加速拦截猎物。

trans-unit.resname: DGM·21 | Bane Alley Blackguard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bane Alley Blackguard
trans-unit.target: 灾祸巷黑市护卫

trans-unit.resname: DGM·21 | Bane Alley Blackguard | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I'm in the field of procurement, and business is good. The guilds want all kinds of maps and relics these days, though what they want them for I'm not quite sure."
trans-unit.target: 「我是干采购这一行的，生意兴隆。公会最近需要各种地图和古物，但我不知道他们要这些东西做什么。」

trans-unit.source: Blood Scrivener
trans-unit.target: 鲜血书记

trans-unit.resname: DGM·22 | Blood Scrivener | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you would draw a card while you have no cards in hand, instead draw two cards and lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将抓一张牌时手上没有牌，则改为抓两张牌并失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Make sure you bleed the fine print.
trans-unit.target: 记得把合约条款仔细地看个清楚。

trans-unit.source: Crypt Incursion
trans-unit.target: 入侵墓穴

trans-unit.resname: DGM·23 | Crypt Incursion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile all creature cards from target player's graveyard. You gain 3 life for each card exiled this way.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标牌手坟墓场中的所有生物牌。每以此法放逐一张牌，你便获得3点生命。

trans-unit.source: The Golgari maze-runner Varolz hungers to prove his fortitude in battle, and his trail of victims feeds other hungers.
trans-unit.target: 葛加理迷宫奔越者瓦罗兹渴望证明自己的作战本事，而他留下的受害者则满足了其他的渴望。

trans-unit.source: Fatal Fumes
trans-unit.target: 致命烟气

trans-unit.resname: DGM·24 | Fatal Fumes | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -4/-2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-4/-2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Travelers in the undercity dread the horrors and assassins of the Dimir, but nearly as many die from more mundane hazards.
trans-unit.target: 地底城的旅人都畏惧底密尔的惊惧兽和杀手，可是死于一般意外的人数其实相去无几。

trans-unit.source: Hired Torturer
trans-unit.target: 雇佣刑吏

trans-unit.resname: DGM·25 | Hired Torturer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender\n{3}{B}, {T}: Target opponent loses 2 life, then reveals a card at random from his or her hand.
trans-unit.target: 守军 {3}{B}，{T}：目标对手失去2点生命，然后从其手上随机展示一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Follow your passion, I always say. Might as well get paid to do what you love."
trans-unit.target: 「我常说『跟着感觉走』。能以兴趣当工作，岂非人生一大乐事？」

trans-unit.source: Maze Abomination
trans-unit.target: 迷宫憎恨兽

trans-unit.resname: DGM·26 | Maze Abomination | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)\nMulticolored creatures you control have deathtouch.
trans-unit.target: 死触（它对生物造成的任何数量伤害都足以消灭后者。） 由你操控的多色生物具有死触异能。

trans-unit.resname: DGM·27 | Pontiff of Blight | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pontiff of Blight
trans-unit.target: 枯萎主教

trans-unit.resname: DGM·27 | Pontiff of Blight | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)\nOther creatures you control have extort. (If a creature has multiple instances of extort, each triggers separately.)
trans-unit.target: 敲诈（每当你施放一个咒语时，你可以支付{W/B}。若你如此作，则每位对手各失去1点生命，且你获得等量的生命。） 由你操控的其他生物具有敲诈异能。（若某生物具有数个敲诈异能，则每一个都会分别触发。）

trans-unit.source: Rakdos Drake
trans-unit.target: 拉铎司龙兽

trans-unit.resname: DGM·28 | Rakdos Drake | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nUnleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 脱缰（你可以让此生物进战场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物。只要其上有+1/+1指示物，它就不能进行阻挡。）

trans-unit.source: Rakdos rioters paint their faces to resemble the drakes' bloodied muzzles.
trans-unit.target: 拉铎司暴乱者会在脸上涂抹油彩，扮成龙兽满嘴鲜血的样子。

trans-unit.source: Sinister Possession
trans-unit.target: 恶念夺身

trans-unit.resname: DGM·29 | Sinister Possession | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, its controller loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 每当所结附的生物进行攻击或阻挡时，其操控者失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "You caught something on a cold night's stroll? No, I'd say something caught you."\n—Mezim Magrah, civic healer
trans-unit.target: 「寒天夜游，着凉了吗？我看你是着了别的东西吧？」 ～市民治疗师梅基马革拉

trans-unit.resname: DGM·30 | Ubul Sar Gatekeepers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ubul Sar Gatekeepers
trans-unit.target: 乌布萨门卫

trans-unit.resname: DGM·30 | Ubul Sar Gatekeepers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若你操控两个或更多门，则目标由对手操控的生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: DGM·30 | Ubul Sar Gatekeepers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There are many gates into the undercity, but few ways out.
trans-unit.target: 地底城有许多入口，但少有出路。

trans-unit.resname: DGM·31 | Awe for the Guilds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Awe for the Guilds
trans-unit.target: 敬畏公会

trans-unit.resname: DGM·31 | Awe for the Guilds | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Monocolored creatures can't block this turn.
trans-unit.target: 单色生物本回合不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: DGM·31 | Awe for the Guilds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When the guilds cooperate, the guildless celebrate their peaceful society. When the guilds clash, the guildless just try to keep out of the way.
trans-unit.target: 当公会间互相合作时，无所属者会一同颂扬祥和的社会。当公会间发生冲突时，无所属者只能尽力躲开战火。

trans-unit.resname: DGM·32 | Clear a Path | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Clear a Path
trans-unit.target: 杀出血路

trans-unit.resname: DGM·32 | Clear a Path | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature with defender.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标具守军异能的生物。

trans-unit.resname: DGM·32 | Clear a Path | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Why do guards always look surprised when we bash them?" asked Ruric. "I think they expect a bribe," said Thar.
trans-unit.target: 「为什么我们每次揍守卫时他们都满脸惊讶？」鲁瑞问道。 杂尔回答：「他们大概以为我们要送钱吧。」

trans-unit.source: Maze Rusher
trans-unit.target: 迷宫急袭怪

trans-unit.resname: DGM·33 | Maze Rusher | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\nMulticolored creatures you control have haste.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 由你操控的多色生物具有敏捷异能。

trans-unit.source: "The maze seems to fight us at every turn, resisting our efforts to solve it."\n—Niv-Mizzet
trans-unit.target: 「迷宫好像存心跟我们作对，就是不愿意让我们走出去。」 ～尼米捷

trans-unit.source: Possibility Storm
trans-unit.target: 愿景齐现

trans-unit.resname: DGM·34 | Possibility Storm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts a spell from his or her hand, that player exiles it, then exiles cards from the top of his or her library until he or she exiles a card that shares a card type with it. That player may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then he or she puts all cards exiled with CARDNAME on the bottom of his or her library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 每当一位牌手从其手牌中施放咒语时，该牌手将它放逐，然后自其牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张与该咒语具有共通牌类别的牌为止。该牌手可以施放该牌且不需支付其法术力费用。然后他将所有被CARDNAME放逐的牌以随机顺序置于其牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: DGM·35 | Punish the Enemy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Punish the Enemy
trans-unit.target: 严惩敌人

trans-unit.resname: DGM·35 | Punish the Enemy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to target player and 3 damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标牌手造成3点伤害，并对目标生物造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: DGM·35 | Punish the Enemy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "When justice descends, the servant will burn with the master."\n—Aurelia
trans-unit.target: 「正义降临时，奴才要随着主子一起受苦受难。」 ～欧瑞梨

trans-unit.source: Pyrewild Shaman
trans-unit.target: 葬火林祭师

trans-unit.resname: DGM·105 | Species Gorger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，将一个由你操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "We raised eelhawks to control the squidflies, then waspcrabs to prey on the eelhawks. Now what do we do with all these waspcrabs?"\n—Gulistan, Simic biomancer
trans-unit.target: 「我们饲养鳗鱼鹰是为了控制乌贼蝇数量，饲养黄蜂蟹是为了猎捕鳗鱼鹰。现在该拿这些黄蜂蟹怎么办？」 ～析米克生机术士顾里斯坦

trans-unit.source: Spike Jester
trans-unit.target: 钉刺小丑

trans-unit.resname: DGM·106 | Spike Jester | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Haste
trans-unit.target: 敏捷

trans-unit.source: For the Rakdos, "suicidal charge" and "good showmanship" are one and the same.
trans-unit.target: 对拉铎司成员来说，「自杀冲锋」和「精彩演技」并没有什么不同。

trans-unit.resname: DGM·107 | Tajic, Blade of the Legion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tajic, Blade of the Legion
trans-unit.target: 教团之刃塔疾克

trans-unit.resname: DGM·107 | Tajic, Blade of the Legion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME is indestructible.\nBattalion — Whenever Tajic and at least two other creatures attack, Tajic gets +5/+5 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不会毁坏。 协战～每当塔疾克与至少两个其他生物攻击时，塔疾克得+5/+5直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: DGM·107 | Tajic, Blade of the Legion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I run the maze alone, but I fight with the full might of the Legion."
trans-unit.target: 「虽然我独身奔越迷宫，但有整个教团的力量助我作战。」

trans-unit.resname: DGM·108 | Teysa, Envoy of Ghosts | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Teysa, Envoy of Ghosts
trans-unit.target: 鬼影特使泰莎

trans-unit.resname: DGM·108 | Teysa, Envoy of Ghosts | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance, protection from creatures\nWhenever a creature deals combat damage to you, destroy that creature. Put a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 警戒，反生物保护 每当一个生物对你造成战斗伤害时，消灭该生物。将一个1/1，白黑双色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Tithe Drinker
trans-unit.target: 税收饮者

trans-unit.resname: DGM·109 | Tithe Drinker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)\nExtort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
trans-unit.target: 系命（此生物所造成的伤害会让你获得等量的生命。） 敲诈（每当你施放一个咒语时，你可以支付{W/B}。若你如此作，则每位对手各失去1点生命，且你获得等量的生命。）

trans-unit.source: Trostani's Summoner
trans-unit.target: 卓塔妮的召唤师

trans-unit.resname: DGM·110 | Trostani's Summoner | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance, a 3/3 green Centaur creature token, and a 4/4 green Rhino creature token with trample onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将一个2/2白色，具警戒异能的骑士衍生生物，一个3/3绿色半人马衍生生物，和一个4/4绿色，具践踏异能的犀牛衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Unflinching Courage
trans-unit.target: 坚定勇气

trans-unit.resname: DGM·111 | Unflinching Courage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and lifelink.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得+2/+2且具有践踏与系命异能。

trans-unit.source: As Trostani's influence grew, vitality spread through the Conclave—much to the other guilds' dismay.
trans-unit.target: 卓塔妮的影响力逐渐扩张，盟会的活力强大得让其他公会更加担忧。

trans-unit.resname: DGM·112 | Varolz, the Scar-Striped | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Varolz, the Scar-Striped
trans-unit.target: 痕躯瓦罗兹

trans-unit.resname: DGM·112 | Varolz, the Scar-Striped | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Each creature card in your graveyard has scavenge. The scavenge cost is equal to its mana cost. (Exile a creature card from your graveyard and pay its mana cost: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to that card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)\nSacrifice another creature: Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场的每张生物牌都具有食腐异能。其食腐费用等同于该牌的法术力费用。（将一张生物牌从你的坟墓场中放逐并支付其法术力费用：在目标生物上放置若干+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于该牌的力量。食腐的时机视同法术。） 牺牲另一个生物：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Viashino Firstblade
trans-unit.target: 凡尔西诺尖兵

trans-unit.resname: DGM·113 | Viashino Firstblade | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 当CARDNAME进战场时，它得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "All that steel doesn't make them slower. It makes them bolder."\n—Tajic, Blade of the Legion
trans-unit.target: 「即使前有刀山剑海，他们的脚步毫不迟疑，只会更加果敢。」 ～教团之刃塔疾克

trans-unit.resname: DGM·114 | Voice of Resurgence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Voice of Resurgence
trans-unit.target: 复苏之音

trans-unit.resname: DGM·114 | Voice of Resurgence | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn or when CARDNAME dies, put a green and white Elemental creature token onto the battlefield with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control."
trans-unit.target: 每当一位对手于你的回合中施放咒语或当CARDNAME死去时，将一个绿白双色的元素衍生生物放进战场，且具有「此生物之力量和防御力各等同于由你操控的生物数量。」

trans-unit.resname: DGM·115 | Vorel of the Hull Clade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vorel of the Hull Clade
trans-unit.target: 壳进化组的沃瑞

trans-unit.resname: DGM·115 | Vorel of the Hull Clade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {G}{U}, {T}: For each counter on target artifact, creature, or land, put another of those counters on that permanent.
trans-unit.target: {G}{U}，{T}：对目标神器、生物或地上的每个指示物而言，在该永久物上放置一个同样的指示物。

trans-unit.resname: DGM·115 | Vorel of the Hull Clade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I used to hurl rocks and eat scraps of meat burned over a fire. Look at what I've become and tell me Simic does not hold infinite possibility."
trans-unit.target: 「我以前只会丢丢石头、火烤碎肉充饥。看看我现在的样子。你敢说析米克没有无限可能？」

trans-unit.source: Warleader's Helix
trans-unit.target: 战领旋咒

trans-unit.resname: DGM·116 | Warleader's Helix | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成4点伤害，且你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.source: "There is no time to remedy our enemies' ignorance. Blast it out of them."\n—Aurelia
trans-unit.target: 「没时间去纠正敌人的无知。直接把他们毙了。」 ～欧瑞梨

trans-unit.source: Warped Physique
trans-unit.target: 歪曲体形

trans-unit.resname: DGM·117 | Warped Physique | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+X/-X直到回合结束，X为你的手牌数量。

trans-unit.source: The Gruul seek unbounded strength. The Dimir deliver cruel irony.
trans-unit.target: 古鲁寻求无尽力量。底密尔则残酷反讽。

trans-unit.source: Woodlot Crawler
trans-unit.target: 林地爬虫

trans-unit.resname: DGM·118 | Woodlot Crawler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Forestwalk, protection from green
trans-unit.target: 树林行者，反绿保护

trans-unit.source: "We learned something from the Simic. Unfortunately for them."\n—Nefara, Dimir agent
trans-unit.target: 「析米克让我们学到了东西。这下他们可惨了。」 ～底密尔密探涅法拉

trans-unit.source: Zhur-Taa Ancient
trans-unit.target: 筑塔族祖兽

trans-unit.resname: DGM·119 | Zhur-Taa Ancient | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced.
trans-unit.target: 每当牌手横置一个地以产生法术力时，该牌手加一点法术力到他的法术力池中，其类别为该地刚才已产生之类别。

trans-unit.source: Many Ravnicans think of nature as orderly groves and elf-tended rot farms. They haven't seen the Gruul wilds.
trans-unit.target: 很多拉尼卡子民都认为大自然就是井然有序的树丛，以及由妖精照顾的腐尸农场。那是因为他们还没看过古鲁所在的野地。

trans-unit.source: Zhur-Taa Druid
trans-unit.target: 筑塔族德鲁伊

trans-unit.resname: DGM·120 | Zhur-Taa Druid | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.source: "Only the decadent think magic should be pristine and without cost."
trans-unit.target: 「只有颓废者才以为法术应该纯净而且无须代价。」

trans-unit.target: 消灭目标结界。 融咒 （你可以从手牌中单独施放此牌任一边或一同施放两边。）

trans-unit.source: Azorius Cluestone
trans-unit.target: 俄佐立示石

trans-unit.resname: DGM·136 | Azorius Cluestone | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.\n{W}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{W}或{U}到你的法术力池中。 {W}{U}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Its three sides represent the Sova, judges and arbitrators; the Jelenn, scribes and elocutors; and the Lyev, lawmages and enforcers.
trans-unit.target: 它的三面代表了索瓦议会的法官和仲裁人，杰连议会的书记官和朗诵人，以及徕夫议会的律法师和执法者。

trans-unit.source: Boros Cluestone
trans-unit.target: 波洛斯示石

trans-unit.resname: DGM·137 | Boros Cluestone | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.\n{R}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{R}或{W}到你的法术力池中。 {R}{W}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "In case of fire, treachery, citywide riot, political upheaval, or worldwide societal collapse, break glass."\n—Cluestone inscription
trans-unit.target: 「如果发生火灾、叛变、全城暴动、政治动荡或全世界社会结构崩溃，请打破玻璃。」 ～示石铭文

trans-unit.source: Dimir Cluestone
trans-unit.target: 底密尔示石

trans-unit.resname: DGM·138 | Dimir Cluestone | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.\n{U}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{U}或{B}到你的法术力池中。 {U}{B}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: It waits in the chill of the undercity, holding nameless secrets for those who dare to touch it.
trans-unit.target: 它在阴冷的地底城静静等候，守着无名的秘密，就看谁敢碰触。

trans-unit.source: Golgari Cluestone
trans-unit.target: 葛加理示石

trans-unit.resname: DGM·139 | Golgari Cluestone | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.\n{B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{B}或{G}到你的法术力池中。 {B}{G}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Golgari mold collects whispers, intelligence that is later harvested by Jarad and his high chancellors.
trans-unit.target: 葛加理的腐霉收集耳语和情报，再由贾雷和他的高阶策士收成。

trans-unit.source: Gruul Cluestone
trans-unit.target: 古鲁示石

trans-unit.resname: DGM·140 | Gruul Cluestone | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.\n{R}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{R}或{G}到你的法术力池中。 {R}{G}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Forgotten under rocks and vines, Gruul symbols mark the sites of primitive rituals where shamans once chanted to the wild.
trans-unit.target: 古鲁符号早在荒烟漫草间遭人遗忘，但它们标志着古时祭师向荒野吟颂、举行原始仪式的场所。

trans-unit.source: Izzet Cluestone
trans-unit.target: 伊捷示石

trans-unit.resname: DGM·141 | Izzet Cluestone | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.\n{U}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{U}或{R}到你的法术力池中。 {U}{R}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: It holds within it an unsolvable riddle. A creative answer yields an invitation to the guild.
trans-unit.target: 内部藏有无法破解的谜题。只要提出具有创意的答案，就能获邀进入公会。

trans-unit.source: Orzhov Cluestone
trans-unit.target: 欧佐夫示石

trans-unit.resname: DGM·142 | Orzhov Cluestone | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.\n{W}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{W}或{B}到你的法术力池中。 {W}{B}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: A symbol of power and wealth, the only commodities that matter to the Orzhov.
trans-unit.target: 权力与财富的象征，欧佐夫眼中的唯一价值。

trans-unit.source: Rakdos Cluestone
trans-unit.target: 拉铎司示石

trans-unit.resname: DGM·143 | Rakdos Cluestone | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.\n{B}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{B}或{R}到你的法术力池中。 {B}{R}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Burn. Bleed. Enjoy."\n—Cluestone inscription
trans-unit.target: 「燃烧。流血。享受。」 ～示石铭文

trans-unit.source: Selesnya Cluestone
trans-unit.target: 瑟雷尼亚示石

trans-unit.resname: DGM·144 | Selesnya Cluestone | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.\n{G}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{G}或{W}到你的法术力池中。 {G}{W}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Break it if you must. The loss of one relic is nothing next to the value of enriching us all."\n—Suniel the Woodwise
trans-unit.target: 「如果有必要，就打碎它。和造福我们所有人相比，损失一块遗宝算不了什么。」 ～林木智者宋尼

trans-unit.source: Simic Cluestone
trans-unit.target: 析米克示石

trans-unit.resname: DGM·145 | Simic Cluestone | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.\n{G}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{G}或{U}到你的法术力池中。 {G}{U}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Simic symbols are among the most intricate and fragile, yet few vandalize them for fear of the strange lifeforms that might be released.
trans-unit.target: 析米克的符号最为复杂脆弱，但是少有人去破坏，因为他们害怕会放出奇怪的生物。

trans-unit.source: Azorius Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 俄佐立公会门

trans-unit.resname: DGM·146 | Azorius Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{W}或{U}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: The Azorius symbol stares down like a great eye, reminding visitors of the watchful presence of Isperia and her lawmages.
trans-unit.target: 俄佐立的奇诡符号如巨眼般俯视一切，让访客随时感受着伊佩利与其律法师的重重监视。

trans-unit.source: Boros Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 波洛斯公会门

trans-unit.resname: DGM·147 | Boros Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{R}或{W}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: It promises protection to those in need and proclaims a warning to any who would threaten Ravnican law.
trans-unit.target: 它承诺会让弱者受到保护，立誓要让威胁拉尼卡律法者受到切实威吓，不敢轻举妄动。

trans-unit.source: Dimir Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 底密尔公会门

trans-unit.resname: DGM·148 | Dimir Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}或{B}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: In the cold corridors of the undercity, misinformation unfurls from Duskmantle like a spreading stain.
trans-unit.target: 伪造迷讯自暮篷始发，藉由地底城的寒冷走廊四处传播，有如污迹向外扩散。

trans-unit.source: Golgari Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 葛加理公会门

trans-unit.resname: DGM·149 | Golgari Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{B}或{G}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Every part of the gate was reclaimed from forgotten ruins and imbued with new purpose by the Swarm.
trans-unit.target: 门的每个部份都是从人迹罕至的破败遗迹解回，重新注入群落的使命。

trans-unit.source: Gruul Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 古鲁公会门

trans-unit.resname: DGM·150 | Gruul Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{R}或{G}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: The scarred rubble around the gate is testament to past meetings of the Clans, summits that inevitably devolved into brawls.
trans-unit.target: 门旁的碎石见证着部族过往的集会～十有八九均会化作斗殴一场的领袖聚议。

trans-unit.source: Izzet Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 伊捷公会门

trans-unit.resname: DGM·151 | Izzet Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}或{R}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Beyond lies the culmination of all Izzet projects, a grand experiment led by the dragon Niv-Mizzet himself.
trans-unit.target: 门后深宫内满是伊捷已臻至极致的所有计划，巨龙尼米捷尽其所能亲自领导的伟大试验初具雏形。

trans-unit.source: Maze's End
trans-unit.target: 迷宫终点

trans-unit.resname: DGM·152 | Maze's End | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{3}, {T}, Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand: Search your library for a Gate card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. If you control ten or more Gates with different names, you win the game.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {3}，{T}，将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上：从你的牌库中搜寻一张门牌，将之放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。如果你操控十个或更多名称各不相同的门，你便赢得这盘游戏。

trans-unit.source: Orzhov Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 欧佐夫公会门

trans-unit.resname: DGM·153 | Orzhov Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{W}或{B}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: "We do not believe in hiding our wealth in the shadows. This is Orzhov, and this is how we reward greatness."\n—Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov
trans-unit.target: 「我们不会把财富秘藏在不见天日的地方。这就是欧佐夫。这就是我们的立足之本与彰显荣耀的方式。」 ～欧佐夫大特使泰莎卡洛夫

trans-unit.source: Rakdos Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 拉铎司公会门

trans-unit.resname: DGM·154 | Rakdos Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{B}或{R}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Maze-runners who pass through the Rakdos gate leave behind their scruples and a significant amount of skin.
trans-unit.target: 告离拉铎司门口的迷宫奔越者，已将所有顾忌与大量皮肤化作脑后云烟。

trans-unit.source: Selesnya Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 瑟雷尼亚公会门

trans-unit.resname: DGM·155 | Selesnya Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME横须置进战场。 {T}：加{G}或{W}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: The Selesnya welcome all to help them heal the city's wounds. The price, however, is devotion to the guild and a selfless belief in Trostani.
trans-unit.target: 瑟雷尼亚盟会欢迎有志者一同协助疗愈此城的伤口。不过代价是向公会效忠，并且不藏私地信奉卓塔妮。

trans-unit.source: Simic Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 析米克公会门

trans-unit.resname: DGM·156 | Simic Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{G}或{U}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Simic biomancers don't concern themselves with guarding a gate. Their ever-present creations are enough to ward off trespassers.
trans-unit.target: 析米克这些生体术士大约从不担心防卫问题。他们不断造出的成品就足以吓阻入侵者。
